name: Wheel of Miss Fortune
description:
The Wheel of Miss Fortune is a simple, but touching adventure, about two lovers divided by the whims of fate. Best the spinning wheel, gain enough "luck" and overcome the Fortune's wrath against a noble knight! Controls: LMB and up/down arrows or W/S keys.

Enemies can drop healing items, so if you are low on health try avoiding stronger enemies and attack weaker ones instead.

[Made in 1 week for Brackeys 2023.1 GameJam]

We have not managed to implement the following: RPG systems, Progression system, Roguelike wheel generation, Fairy tale visuals, Style coherency.

3D Designer - Ilya Danilov

2D Designer/Illustrator - Daniil Rozhkov

Unity Programmer - Artem Frol

1 Game Designer

1 Sound Designer
